Consumable.Name: Elixir of Shadows
Consumable.Description: A vial containing a swirling, dark liquid that grants the drinker enhanced stealth abilities.
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Grants temporary invisibility when in shadows
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Essential for traversing heavily guarded areas undetected.

Consumable.Name: Phoenix Feather
Consumable.Description: A radiant feather that glows with a fiery essence. Can revive the bearer from the brink of death once.
Consumable.Effects: Revives player to 50% health upon death
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Symbolizes hope and rebirth, key to overcoming a major storyline defeat.

Consumable.Name: Chrono Seed
Consumable.Description: A rare seed that can rewind time for a few seconds, allowing the user to undo a recent action.
Consumable.Effects: Allows the user to rewind time by 5 seconds
Consumable.UniqueProperties: Single use; Time reversal effects are limited to personal actions
Consumable.StorylineRelevance: Critical for mastering puzzles that require precise timing.
